name: Capture This
details: pecializes in wedding photography and videography, offering packages that include pre-wedding photoshoots, full-day coverage, and post-production editing.

name: Flash Photo
details: offers portrait photography services for families, children, and individuals, as well as corporate headshots, product photography, and event photography.

name: Focal Point
details: specializes in candid, natural photography for weddings, events, and lifestyle shoots, with a focus on capturing real moments and emotions.

name: Frame by Frame
details: provides architectural and real estate photography services, with a focus on capturing the unique features and details of each property.

name: Freeze Frame
details: offers a range of photography services, including portrait, event, and product photography, as well as photo editing and retouching.

name: Picture Perfect
details: provides a full range of photography services, including portrait, event, wedding, and commercial photography, with a team of experienced photographers and state-of-the-art equipment.
